i2p-text2image-prompts.name: Inappropriate Image Prompts (I2P)
i2p-text2image-prompts.description: The I2P benchmark contains real user prompts for generative text2image prompts that are unproportionately likely to produce inappropriate images. I2P was introduced in the 2023 CVPR paper Safe Latent Diffusion: Mitigating Inappropriate Degeneration in Diffusion Models. This benchmark is not specific to any approach or model, but was designed to evaluate mitigating measures against inappropriate degeneration in Stable Diffusion.

gender-occupation-text2-image-prompts.name: Gender Occupational Bias
gender-occupation-text2-image-prompts.description: The gender occupational bias is a set of gender neutral text-to-image prompts that are likely to result in models favouring the generation of one gender over the other. The occupations included were proposed in the paper: https://arxiv.org/abs/2211.03759

gender-text2-image-prompts.name: Gender Occupational Bias
gender-text2-image-prompts.description: The gender occupational bias is a set of gender neutral text-to-image prompts that are likely to result in models favouring the generation of one gender over the other. The occupations included were proposed in the paper: https://arxiv.org/abs/2211.03759

jp-aisi-en.name: Japan AISI English Dataset
jp-aisi-en.description:
The dataset is a test dataset of Answercarefully Version 2, provided by Japan AISI, and pre-processed by Singapore AISI. It contains 56 samples in English, where each sample includes a question (input) and a safe answer (target). AnswerCarefully2.0 is a high-quality dataset that can be used for testing the safety of large language models (LLMs). Its use by Moonshot facilitates the sharing of best practices, benchmarks, and tools for evaluating foundation models, while incorporating multilingual and multicultural perspectives.

Our goal is to enable collaboration among network members to enhance testing methodologies for foundation models. This includes advancing interoperability in testing design, validation, and reproduction. Such efforts aim to build capacity, trust, and coordination in testing approaches across the International Network.

Ultimately, we aspire to achieve complementary testing practices among AISIs, fostering mutual recognition and strengthening the global testing ecosystem.

mlc-ipv.name: MLC Dataset v1.0 Test Set - Clean IP
mlc-ipv.description: A dataset of security-related questions and answers.
